name: Ritik Kumar
summary: Lead Data Scientist & Co-founder with expertise in Python, SQL, TensorFlow, and MLOps. Delivered production ML solutions achieving 99.9% uptime, reduced deployment times by 71%, and improved model accuracy from 22% to 87% through advanced ensemble techniques.

projects.title: Hybrid Dense-Sparse Fusion for Vision-Language Retrieval
projects.summary: Engineered two-stage architecture integrating CLIP embeddings with TF-IDF sparse features, achieving 98.7% Recall@10 on MS-COCO dataset.
highlights: Achieved 98.7% Recall@10 on MS-COCO through training-free query-conditioned reranking
Optimised FAISS indexing: 280+ QPS throughput with 6ms latency for 100K+ images
Statistical validation: p<0.01, Cohen's d=2.20 through FAIR-LOO protocol

projects.title: Real-Time Credit Card Fraud Detection
projects.summary: Built Random Forest classifier achieving 94% recall at 2% FPR on 284K transactions with Kafka streaming pipeline processing 500+ TPS.
highlights: Random Forest classifier: 94% recall at 2% false positive rate on 284K transactions
Kafka streaming pipeline processing 500+ transactions per second with sub-second alerts
Reduced false positives by 83% using SMOTE balancing technique

projects.title: AI-Powered Brain Tumour Detection System
projects.summary: Developed CNN achieving 92% accuracy on 3,000+ MRI scans with 88% localisation precision, reducing radiologist review time by 30%.
highlights: CNN achieving 92% accuracy on 3,000+ MRI scans with 88% localisation precision
Reduced radiologist review time by 30% through automated preprocessing
Deployed real-time inference system for clinical workflow integration

projects.title: YOLOv8 Waste Classification for Smart Cities
projects.summary: Developed YOLOv8 waste classification model achieving 95% mAP for Smart Cities Mission with real-time API handling 1,000+ requests/minute.
highlights: YOLOv8 waste classification model achieving 95% mean Average Precision
Enhanced model precision by 8% through transfer learning on 50,000+ annotated images
Deployed real-time API handling 1,000+ requests/minute integrated with municipal dashboard

experience.title: Lead Data Scientist & Co-founder
bullets: Co-founded AI/ML consultancy delivering secure, compliant, production solutions to enterprise clients
Led cross-functional team of 6 engineers implementing Agile methodologies with 2-week sprint cycles
Architected ML pipelines processing 10,000+ daily predictions with 99.9% uptime SLA on AWS
Reduced model deployment time by 71% (7 to 2 days) through CI/CD automation

bullets: Developed YOLOv8 waste classification model achieving 95% mAP for Smart Cities Mission
